verses.verse: בֵּ֣ן <S%H1121><s%> son חָ֭כָם <S%H2450><s%> A wise מ֣וּסַר <S%H4148><s%> instruction אָ֑ב <S%H1><s%> [heareth] his father's וְ֝לֵ֗ץ <S%H3887><s%> but a scorner לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> does not שָׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> heareth גְּעָרָֽה׃ <S%H1606><s%> not rebuke

מִפְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> by the fruit פִי־ <S%H6310><s%> of [his] mouth אִ֭ישׁ <S%H376><s%> A man יֹ֣אכַל <S%H398><s%> shall eat ט֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good וְנֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> but the soul בֹּגְדִ֣ים <S%H898><s%> of the transgressors חָמָֽס׃ <S%H2555><s%> [shall eat] violence

נֹצֵ֣ר <S%H5341><s%> He that keepeth פִּ֭יו <S%H6310><s%> his mouth שֹׁמֵ֣ר <S%H8104><s%> keepeth נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his life פֹּשֵׂ֥ק <S%H6589><s%> [but] he that openeth wide שְׂ֝פָתָ֗יו <S%H8193><s%> his lips מְחִתָּה־ <S%H4288><s%> shall have destruction לֽוֹ׃

מִתְאַוָּ֣ה <S%H183><s%> desireth וָ֭אַיִן <S%H369><s%> and nothing נַפְשׁ֣וֹ <S%H5315><s%> The soul עָצֵ֑ל <S%H6102><s%> of the sluggard וְנֶ֖פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> and [hath] nothing but the soul חָרֻצִ֣ים <S%H2742><s%> of the diligent תְּדֻשָּֽׁן׃ <S%H1878><s%> shall be made fat

דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> act שֶׁ֭קֶר <S%H8267><s%> falsehood יִשְׂנָ֣א <S%H8130><s%> [man] hateth צַדִּ֑יק <S%H6662><s%> A righteous וְ֝רָשָׁ֗ע <S%H7563><s%> but a wicked יַבְאִ֥ישׁ <S%H887><s%> [man] is loathsome וְיַחְפִּֽיר׃ <S%H2659><s%> and cometh to shame

צְ֭דָקָה <S%H6666><s%> Righteousness תִּצֹּ֣ר <S%H5341><s%> keepeth תָּם־ <S%H8537><s%> [him that is] upright דָּ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> in the way וְ֝רִשְׁעָ֗ה <S%H7564><s%> but wickedness תְּסַלֵּ֥ף <S%H5557><s%> overthroweth חַטָּֽאת׃ <S%H2403><s%> the sinner

יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> There is מִ֭תְעַשֵּׁר <S%H6238><s%> that maketh himself rich וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> has כֹּ֑ל <S%H3605><s%> yet מִ֝תְרוֹשֵׁ֗שׁ <S%H7326><s%> yet [hath] nothing [there is] that maketh himself poor וְה֣וֹן <S%H1952><s%> riches רָֽב׃ <S%H7227><s%> [hath] great

כֹּ֣פֶר <S%H3724><s%> The ransom נֶֽפֶשׁ־ <S%H5315><s%> life אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of a man's עָשְׁר֑וֹ <S%H6239><s%> [are] his riches וְ֝רָ֗שׁ <S%H7326><s%> but the poor לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no שָׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> heareth גְּעָרָֽה׃ <S%H1606><s%> not rebuke

אוֹר־ <S%H216><s%> The light צַדִּיקִ֥ים <S%H6662><s%> of the righteous יִשְׂמָ֑ח <S%H8055><s%> rejoiceth וְנֵ֖ר <S%H5216><s%> but the lamp רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked יִדְעָֽךְ׃ <S%H1846><s%> shall be put out

רַק־ <S%H7535><s%> but בְּ֭זָדוֹן <S%H2087><s%> Only by pride יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> cometh מַצָּ֑ה <S%H4683><s%> contention וְאֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for נ֖וֹעָצִ֣ים <S%H3289><s%> but with the well advised חָכְמָֽה׃ <S%H2451><s%> [is] wisdom

ה֭וֹן <S%H1952><s%> Wealth מֵהֶ֣בֶל <S%H1892><s%> [gotten] by vanity יִמְעָ֑ט <S%H4591><s%> shall be diminished וְקֹבֵ֖ץ <S%H6908><s%> but he that gathereth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by יָ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> by labour יַרְבֶּֽה׃ <S%H7235><s%> shall increase

תּוֹחֶ֣לֶת <S%H8431><s%> Hope מְ֭מֻשָּׁכָה <S%H4900><s%> deferred מַחֲלָה־ <S%H2470><s%> sick לֵ֑ב <S%H3820><s%> maketh the heart וְעֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> [it is] a tree חַ֝יִּ֗ים <S%H2416><s%> of life תַּאֲוָ֥ה <S%H8378><s%> but [when] the desire בָאָֽה׃ <S%H935><s%> cometh

בָּ֣ז <S%H936><s%> Whoso despiseth לְ֭דָבָר <S%H1697><s%> the word יֵחָ֣בֶל <S%H2254><s%> shall be destroyed ל֑וֹ וִירֵ֥א <S%H3373><s%> but he that feareth מִ֝צְוָ֗ה <S%H4687><s%> the commandment ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יְשֻׁלָּֽם׃ <S%H7999><s%> shall be rewarded

תּוֹרַ֣ת <S%H8451><s%> The law חָ֭כָם <S%H2450><s%> of the wise מְק֣וֹר <S%H4726><s%> [is] a fountain חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> of life לָ֝ס֗וּר <S%H5493><s%> to depart מִמֹּ֥קְשֵׁי <S%H4170><s%> from the snares מָֽוֶת׃ <S%H4194><s%> of death

שֵֽׂכֶל־ <S%H7922><s%> understanding ט֭וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Good יִתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> giveth חֵ֑ן <S%H2580><s%> favour וְדֶ֖רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> but the way בֹּגְדִ֣ים <S%H898><s%> of transgressors אֵיתָֽן׃ <S%H386><s%> [is] hard

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> Every עָ֭רוּם <S%H6175><s%> Every prudent יַעֲשֶׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> [man] dealeth בְדָ֑עַת <S%H1847><s%> with knowledge וּ֝כְסִ֗יל <S%H3684><s%> but a fool יִפְרֹ֥שׂ <S%H6566><s%> layeth open אִוֶּֽלֶת׃ <S%H200><s%> [his] folly

מַלְאָ֣ךְ <S%H4397><s%> messenger רָ֭שָׁע <S%H7563><s%> A wicked יִפֹּ֣ל <S%H5307><s%> falleth בְּרָ֑ע <S%H7451><s%> into mischief וְצִ֖יר <S%H6735><s%> ambassador אֱמוּנִ֣ים <S%H529><s%> but a faithful מַרְפֵּֽא׃ <S%H4832><s%> [is] health

רֵ֣ישׁ <S%H7389><s%> Poverty וְ֭קָלוֹן <S%H7036><s%> and shame פּוֹרֵ֣עַ <S%H6544><s%> [shall be to] him that refuseth מוּסָ֑ר <S%H4148><s%> instruction וְשׁוֹמֵ֖ר <S%H8104><s%> but he that regardeth תּוֹכַ֣חַת <S%H8433><s%> reproof יְכֻבָּֽד׃ <S%H3513><s%> shall be honoured

תַּאֲוָ֣ה <S%H8378><s%> The desire נִ֭הְיָה <S%H1961><s%> accomplished תֶּעֱרַ֣ב <S%H6149><s%> is sweet לְנָ֑פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> to the soul וְתוֹעֲבַ֥ת <S%H8441><s%> but [it is] abomination כְּ֝סִילִ֗ים <S%H3684><s%> to fools ס֣וּר <S%H5493><s%> to depart מֵרָֽע׃ <S%H7451><s%> from evil

[הָלֹוךְ כ] (הֹולֵ֣ךְ <S%H1980><s%> along ק) אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with חֲכָמִ֣ים <S%H2450><s%> with wise [וַחֲכָם כ] (יֶחְכָּ֑ם <S%H2449><s%> exceeding ק) וְרֹעֶ֖ה <S%H7462><s%> but a companion כְסִילִ֣ים <S%H3684><s%> of fools יֵרֽוֹעַ׃ <S%H7321><s%> shall be destroyed

חַ֭טָּאִים <S%H2400><s%> sinners תְּרַדֵּ֣ף <S%H7291><s%> pursueth רָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> Evil וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צַ֝דִּיקִ֗ים <S%H6662><s%> but to the righteous יְשַׁלֶּם־ <S%H7999><s%> shall be repayed טֽוֹב׃ <S%H2896><s%> good

ט֗וֹב <S%H2896><s%> A good יַנְחִ֥יל <S%H5157><s%> [man] leaveth an inheritance בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> to his children's בָנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> children וְצָפ֥וּן <S%H6845><s%> [is] laid up לַ֝צַּדִּ֗יק <S%H6662><s%> for the just חֵ֣יל <S%H2428><s%> and the wealth חוֹטֵֽא׃ <S%H2398><s%> of the sinner

רָב־ <S%H7230><s%> Much אֹ֭כֶל <S%H400><s%> food נִ֣יר <S%H5215><s%> [is in] the tillage רָאשִׁ֑ים <S%H7326><s%> of the poor וְיֵ֥שׁ <S%H3426><s%> but there is נִ֝סְפֶּ֗ה <S%H5595><s%> [that is] destroyed בְּלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> for want מִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> of judgment

חוֹשֵׂ֣ךְ <S%H2820><s%> He that spareth שִׁ֭בְטוֹ <S%H7626><s%> his rod שׂוֹנֵ֣א <S%H8130><s%> hateth בְנ֑וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son וְ֝אֹהֲב֗וֹ <S%H157><s%> but he that loveth שִֽׁחֲר֥וֹ <S%H7836><s%> him betimes מוּסָֽר׃ <S%H4148><s%> him chasteneth

צַדִּ֗יק <S%H6662><s%> The righteous אֹ֭כֵל <S%H398><s%> eateth לְשֹׂ֣בַע <S%H7648><s%> to the satisfying נַפְשׁ֑וֹ <S%H5315><s%> of his soul וּבֶ֖טֶן <S%H990><s%> but the belly רְשָׁעִ֣ים <S%H7563><s%> of the wicked תֶּחְסָֽר׃ <S%H2637><s%> shall want פ
